response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I believe its true potential lies in the hands of someone who can appreciate and utilize it to its fullest extent. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $500,000, which I believe is a fair representation of its worth and a testament to its exceptional quality.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require further information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to provide additional details to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 500000}
